casename: Rahman Pachan Pillai Prasana v Public Prosecutor
counsel: Selva K Naidu (Naidu Mohan & Theseira) for the appellant; Francis Ng (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Sentencing/Mitigation/Whether the fact that an offender has made no financial gain or has caused no financial loss to another from fabricating false evidence a mitigating factor.

Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Sentencing/Benchmark sentences/Disparity with sentences imposed in previous similar cases/Whether consistency in sentencing overriding consideration/Applicable principles.
